baserowapi: API wrapper for Baserow
====================================

Welcome to the baserowapi documentation. 
baserowapi is a high-level API wrapper 
designed to integrate with Baserow `https://baserow.io <https://baserow.io>`, 
the open-source no-code database tool.

Getting Started
----------------
The :doc:`Quickstart guide </quickstart>` is available for those eager to set up 
and initiate their first API call with baserowapi.

Feedback and Contributions
---------------------------
Feedback is appreciated. Whether it's a feature request, a bug report, or comments on this documentation, input is welcome. 
Please fork the repository and create a pull request for any proposed changes.
